response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. This exceptional item holds significant value for you, just like it does for us. We understand its worth and would like to present you with an opportunity to acquire it at a special introductory price of $10,800. This offer represents a generous discount, allowing you to benefit from our product at a highly favorable rate. We believe this is a compelling proposition that aligns well with your interest in obtaining high-quality items at competitive prices. Please let us know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer, and we'll be delighted to guide you through the process. Thank you for considering our product, and we look forward to potentially serving you soon.", "product_price": 10800}
